sentence.Network_en: I have lost dispiritedly, brokenhearted, but all also have what use?
sentence.Network_cn: 我失落过、颓废过 、 心碎过, 但一切又有何用 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: I hate to see those who work dispiritedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我讨厌见到工作时没精打采的人.

sentence.Network_en: The first Mozartian opera to be subjected to this curious treatment ran dispiritedly for five performances.
sentence.Network_cn: 注定会遭受此种吹毛求疵的批评的第一部莫扎特歌剧毫无生气地上演了五次.
